  • aeneas.models.Model 
    Modifier and Type Constant Field Value
    public final java.lang.String aboutString "ABOUT"
    public static final java.lang.String aboutText "KabaSuji is a brilliant new puzzle game. It is the visionary work of Dr. George T Heineman, and has been judiciously implemented by Peter Mitrano, James Kuszmaul, Joseph Martin, Logan Tutt, and Garrison Hefter."
    public final java.lang.String helpString "HELP"
    public static final java.lang.String helpText "The editor allows you to build you\'re own levels. You can save your levels, and play them back later.\n\nStars are earned on your performance, and you must earn one star to proceed to the next level. Pieces can be dragged on to and around the board, depending on the level type. You can rotate and flip pieces by right clicking on a piece. You can also use the following key-bindings:\n\n\tclick: rotate clockwise\n\tshift + click: rotate counter-clockwise\n\tctrl + click: flip horizontally\n\tctrl + shift + click: flip vertically\n\nHave fun!"
